title: These Goofy Pics Of Deepika Padukone Trying To Make Her Mom Smile Will Turn Your Heart To Mush!
text:
There is nothing more special in this life than being close to your mother and feeling her warmth. Her unconditional love and support in life is what makes our life special. For superstar Deepika Padukone, life is all about seizing such special moments.
Instagram
Ranveer has time and again described her lady-love as a 10 on 10 family woman and we know this is indeed the truth. No matter how busy Padukone's schedule is, she is often seen spending time with her family and making the most of her little breaks she takes from her work. Today, she took to Instagram to share some adorable pictures with mother Ujjala Padukone.
Instagram
The pictures shared by Padukone were taken on the day of Sportstar Aces Awards last week, where Prakash Padukone was felicitated with a lifetime achievement award. Padukone captioned these pictures as:
Don't Miss 5.3 K SHARES 2.6 K SHARES 24.3 K SHARES 17 K SHARES 11.2 K SHARES
"Trying to get her to smile... but she's such a natural."
Have a look at the pictures that Deepika shared today. As soon as Deepika shared the pictures, it started receiving a lot of love on the internet.
Instagram
Instagram
Last week, when Ranveer and Deepika were seen with their family on this special day, their pictures of being together melted a lot of hearts. A few pictures of an emotional Deepika made way on the internet.
